content: परिवर्तिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Moving or turning round, revolving. {@--2@} Ever-recurring. coming round again and again परिवर्तिनि संसारे मृतः को वा न जायते <ls>Pt. 1. 27.</ls> {@--3@} Changing. {@--4@} Being; or remaining near, moving round about. {@--5@} Retreating, flying. {@--6@} Exchanging. {@--7@} Recompensing, requiting.
